content: Dr. Tatsuya Unno will be giving a keynote speech on marine microbiome data processing at the Seoul Bioinformatics Summit.
Dr. Kim secures funding to investigate novel anti-biofilm strategies using computational modeling.
Our paper on *E. coli* virulence factor regulation is now out in the Journal of Bacteriology.
We welcomed two new Master's students, Minho and Jisoo, to the team!
Dr. [PI's Last Name] presented new genomics data at the International Microbial Symposium.
Postdoc Jane Doe's review on host-pathogen signaling has been accepted by *Cell Host & Microbe*.
The team successfully concluded the annual sample collection trip in the Cheongju area.
